Package dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.xform

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractWidgetDescription
    An AbstractWidgetDescription allows to create a widget from a WidgetModel.
    AbstractWidgetDescriptions
    Implementations of this class allow to create widgets from a WidgetModel.
    DefaultParameterDescription
    This class describes a parameter that is used to instantiate a widget.
    DefaultWidgetDescription
    The DefaultWidgetDescription allows to create new widgets by calling methods on a AbstractWidgetDescriptions class described by DefaultParameterDescriptions.
    PageModel
    This class forms the root element of the widgets within a page.
    WidgetModel
    A WidgetModel describes the parameters needed to instantiate a single widget.
    WidgetModelElement
    The description of parameters that are used for creating a new widget instance form a tree of WidgetModelElements with a WidgetModel instance as the root element describing the type of the widget.
    XFormMultiPage
    This class represents a multi page guided configuration dialog of which the GUI is built up via an XML description.
    XFormPage
    This class represents a single page wizard that creates its GUI from an XForm XML model.
